verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor, A Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-Da-Vid of David יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD קְ֭רָאתִיךָ <S%H7121><s%> Ke-ra-ti-cha I cry ח֣וּשָׁה <S%H2363><s%> Chu-shah unto thee make haste לִּ֑י Li; הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <S%H238><s%> ha-'a-Zi-nah unto me give ear ק֝וֹלִ֗י <S%H6963><s%> ko-Li, unto my voice בְּקָרְאִי־ <S%H7121><s%> be-ka-re-'i- when I cry לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

תִּכּ֤וֹן <S%H3559><s%> tik-Kon be set forth תְּפִלָּתִ֣י <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-la-Ti Let my prayer קְטֹ֣רֶת <S%H7004><s%> ke-To-ret thee [as] incense לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha; before מַֽשְׂאַ֥ת <S%H4864><s%> mas-'At [and] the lifting up כַּ֝פַּ֗י <S%H3709><s%> kap-Pai, of my hands מִנְחַת־ <S%H4503><s%> min-chat- sacrifice עָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> 'A-rev. [as] the evening

שִׁיתָ֣ה <S%H7896><s%> shi-Tah Set יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD שָׁמְרָ֣ה <S%H8108><s%> sha-me-Rah a watch לְפִ֑י <S%H6310><s%> le-Fi; before my mouth נִ֝צְּרָ֗ה <S%H5341><s%> nitz-tze-Rah, keep עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over דַּ֥ל <S%H1817><s%> dal the door שְׂפָתָֽי׃ <S%H8193><s%> se-fa-Tai. of my lips אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay תַּט־ <S%H5186><s%> tat- afternoon

לִבִּ֨י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi not my heart לְדָבָ֪ר׀ <S%H1697><s%> le-da-Var thing רָ֡ע <S%H7451><s%> ra' to [any] evil לְהִתְע֘וֹלֵ֤ל <S%H5953><s%> le-hit-'o-Lel to practise עֲלִל֨וֹת׀ <S%H5949><s%> a-li-Lot works בְּרֶ֗שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> be-Re-sha', wicked אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for אִישִׁ֥ים <S%H582><s%> 'i-Shim who פֹּֽעֲלֵי־ <S%H6466><s%> po-'a-lei- that work אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven; iniquity וּבַל־ <S%H1077><s%> u-val- lest אֶ֝לְחַ֗ם <S%H3898><s%> 'el-Cham, and let me not eat בְּמַנְעַמֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4516><s%> be-man-'am-mei-Hem. of their dainties

יֶֽהֶלְמֵֽנִי־ <S%H1986><s%> ye-hel-me-ni- smite צַדִּ֨יק׀ <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik Let the righteous חֶ֡סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Che-sed me [it shall be] a kindness וְֽיוֹכִיחֵ֗נִי <S%H3198><s%> ve-yo-chi-Che-ni, and let him reprove שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> She-men oil רֹ֭אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh me [it shall be] an excellent אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay יָנִ֣י <S%H5106><s%> ya-Ni [which] shall not break רֹאשִׁ֑י <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shi; my head כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od still וּ֝תְפִלָּתִ֗י <S%H8605><s%> u-te-fil-la-Ti, for yet my prayer בְּרָעוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H7451><s%> be-ra-'o-tei-Hem. also [shall be] in their calamities

נִשְׁמְט֣וּ <S%H8058><s%> nish-me-Tu are overthrown בִֽידֵי־ <S%H3027><s%> vi-dei- places סֶ֭לַע <S%H5553><s%> Se-la' in stony שֹׁפְטֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8199><s%> sho-fe-tei-Hem; When their judges וְשָׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> ve-sha-me-'U they shall hear אֲ֝מָרַ֗י <S%H561><s%> 'a-ma-Rai, my words כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נָעֵֽמוּ׃ <S%H5276><s%> na-'E-mu. for they are sweet

כְּמ֤וֹ <S%H3644><s%> ke-Mo one פֹלֵ֣חַ <S%H6398><s%> fo-Le-ach as when one cutteth וּבֹקֵ֣עַ <S%H1234><s%> u-vo-Ke-a' and cleaveth בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz; [wood] upon the earth נִפְזְר֥וּ <S%H6340><s%> nif-ze-Ru are scattered עֲ֝צָמֵ֗ינוּ <S%H6106><s%> 'a-tza-Mei-nu, Our bones לְפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> le-Fi mouth שְׁאֽוֹל׃ <S%H7585><s%> she-'ol. at the grave's

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֵלֶ֨יךָ׀ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha are toward יְהוִ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh GOD אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord עֵינָ֑י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai; But mine eyes בְּכָ֥ה be-Chah חָ֝סִ֗יתִי <S%H2620><s%> cha-Si-ti, in thee is my trust אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תְּעַ֥ר <S%H6168><s%> te-'Ar destitute נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi. not my soul

שָׁמְרֵ֗נִי <S%H8104><s%> sha-me-Re-ni, Keep מִ֣ידֵי <S%H3027><s%> Mi-dei the jaws פַ֭ח <S%H6341><s%> fach of the trap יָ֣קְשׁוּ <S%H3369><s%> Ya-ke-shu [which] they have laid לִ֑י Li; וּ֝מֹקְשׁ֗וֹת <S%H4170><s%> u-mo-ke-Shot, for me and the gins פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> Po-'a-lei of the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven. of iniquity

יִפְּל֣וּ <S%H5307><s%> yip-pe-Lu fall בְמַכְמֹרָ֣יו <S%H4364><s%> ve-mach-mo-Rav into their own nets רְשָׁעִ֑ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im; Let the wicked יַ֥חַד <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad whilst that I withal אָ֝נֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi, I עַֽד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- While אֶעֱבֽוֹר׃ <S%H5674><s%> e-'e-Vor. escape
